Pre-Game Insights: Both USA and Canada captains, Aaron Jones and Saad Bin Zafar, expressed their intent to play an enterprising brand of cricket and not hold back.
The match is the opening fixture of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 and is a highly anticipated rivalry between the two North American teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being held at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas, a converted Minor League Baseball stadium, which is a unique venue for T20 World Cup.
